messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension?
The ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension is used to display the segmentation masks generated by YOLOv8 model.
Where can the yolov8x-seg.pt model file for ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask be found?
The yolov8x-seg.pt model can be found at this URL: https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases/download/v8.2.0/yolov8x-seg.pt
What is the full name of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension?
The full name of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension is ComfyUI_YoloSegment_Mask.
What is the function of the Object Mask node in ComfyUI?
The Object Mask node is used to display the segmentation masks from the YOLOv8 model.
How do users input the model file for ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask?
The user needs to push the yolov8x-seg.pt model file into the models/yolo directory.
What version of the models/yolo directory should the yolov8x-seg.pt model file be pushed into?
The yolov8x-seg.pt model file should be pushed into the version 8.2.0 of the models/yolo directory.
Which extension provides the capability to display segmentation masks in ComfyUI?
The ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension provides the capability to display segmentation masks from the YOLOv8 model in ComfyUI.
